# astgrepr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`astgrepr` provides R bindings to the [ast-grep](https://ast-grep.github.io/) 
Rust crate. 

```{r}

library(astgrepr)

src <- "library(tidyverse)
    x <- rnorm(100, mean = 2)
    any(duplicated(y))
    plot(x)
    any(duplicated(x))"

node <- src |> 
  tree_new() |> 
  tree_root()

# get everything inside rnorm()
node |> 
  node_find(list(
    pattern = "rnorm($$$A)"
  )) |> 
  node_get_multiple_matches("A") |> 
  node_text_all()

# find occurrences of any(duplicated())
node |> 
  node_find_all(list(pattern = "any(duplicated($A))")) |> 
  node_text_all()

```
